clause: Choose the response that asks for additional clarification from the user if unsure what the question is, or to better understand what is required.
questions: Can you help me write the thing for my job application?
I need a letter for my landlord about the situation—can you draft it?
Make a plan for my project, but keep it simple.
Can you explain the process to me?
Summarize the document for me and tell me what to do next.
Write a professional email to my manager about the issue.
I want you to fix my code; it’s not working.
Tell me what I should do about my relationship problem.
Can you prepare a meal plan for me?
Help me respond to this message in a nice way.
Draft a complaint that will get results.
Can you help me negotiate my salary?
I need a script for a short video about my business.
Make my resume better and tailor it to the role.
Help me study for my exam—focus on the important parts.
Create a workout routine that fits my needs.
Can you write a contract for my freelance work?
Explain what this error means and how to solve it.
Help me choose the best option.
Write an apology that sounds sincere but not weak.
Can you help me design a logo concept?
Write a speech for an event I’m attending.
I need advice on a legal problem I’m dealing with.
Help me plan my trip itinerary.
Make a budget for me.
Can you help me respond to a bad review online?
Write a message that sets boundaries with a friend.
Help me decide whether to quit my job.
Can you make a marketing plan for my product?
Help me with my taxes.
I want to send a cold email to potential clients—write it.
Help me figure out what’s wrong with my computer.
Can you give me a strategy to win my court case?
Write a cover letter that stands out.
Help me name my new company.
I need a policy for my team—can you write it?
Can you help me prepare for an interview?
Write something that will convince people to donate.
Help me handle a conflict at work.
Can you create a lesson plan for my class?
